and bigger loan and once that dried up
same thing with housing and education
you know people used to go to college
and they used to work a part-time job

you recalculate everything to allow

needed to do this
to keep their system operational this is

think about what they did with real

you needed a 20% down payment check your

percent down with the automobile

Commissioner warns that a retirement

commissioner Cara M Stein spoke to
Brookings Institution on Tuesday giving
a talk titled
the new American Dream retirement
security and this is what she said since
World War two Americans have planned the

sufficient income for their golden years
due to a number of factors the financial
health of Social Security trust fund has
been declining we move from a collective

retirement crisis is a tsunami that is
rapidly approaching we can already see
it and indeed we are starting to feel
its effect Americans are having to work
past traditional retirement age and the
number of bankruptcies for those over
the age of 65 has increased dramatically
the size and speed of the tsunami is
likely to increase as it gets closer and

the cost of medic medical care an
important factor for retirees is
increasing we must address these
problems before we are collectively
underwater now remember we see these

Fund the CalPERS pension fund the
pension fund in Detroit the Dallas
police pension fund and many others they
are struggling and most of them
have projected that they would get
returns on 8% 7% and what they've done

stock market this is going to be a
